data.title: Union Bank Of India Share Price Dips As Q1 Advances, Deposits Decline
data.description: Union Bank of India Ltd.'s share price declined nearly 6% in Wednesday's session as the lender's advances and deposits declined sequentially in the first quarter of fiscal 2026. Its advances fell 2.4% on the quarter to Rs 12.4 lakh crore in the June quarter.

data.title: Union Bank Q1 Update: Total Business Rises 5%, Domestic Retail Advances Up 26%
data.description: Union Bank of India announced on Tuesday that its total business for the quarter ended June rose 5% to Rs 21.09 lakh crore, while it fell 1.8% sequentially. The total deposits for the quarter under review rose 3.63% to Rs 11.97 lakh crore, while it fell 2.54% sequentially. While domestic deposits for the quarter rose 3.62% to Rs 11.96 lakh crore, domestic CASA deposits were up 0.92% to Rs 3.99 lakh crore.
data.keywords: Union Bank Of India, share price

data.title: India’s WPI likely rose to 0.80% in June: Union Bank report
data.description: India’s wholesale inflation likely rose to 0.80% in June 2025 due to rising core, food, and fuel prices. Union Bank flags risks from global and weather factors.
data.keywords: India wholesale inflation June 2025, WPI June 2025 data, Core WPI inflation India, Union Bank inflation report, Food fuel price inflation India
